content: row remove stitch markers at either side of cable braid band and knit across all 11 or 14 stitches try on glove to check length from wrist to base of ring finger and adjust if necessary ring finger knit 3 4 5 6 7 8 stitches save next 23 27 31 35 38 42 stitches on to stitch holder waste yarn or extra double pointed needles cast on 4 stitches knit 7 8 9 10 10 11 stitches total of 14 16 18 20 21 23 stitches for ring finger knit 16 18 20 22 24 26 row or to desired length for finger bind off hand from base of ring finger to base of middle finger rejoin yarn to reserved 23 27 31 35 38 42 stitches leaving an approximately 6 /15 cm tail to close holes at base of little finger knit 23 27 31 35 38 42 stitches pick up 4 stitches between ring and middle fingers total of 27 31 35 39 42 46 stitches knit 4 4 5 5 6 6 additional row try on glove to check length from wrist to base of middle finger and adjust if necessary cratchit cable braid gloves page 5 of 6 www dancingtriceratops com middle finger knit 6 7 8 9 10 11 stitches save next 12 14 16 18 19 21 stitches on to stitch holder waste yarn or extra double pointed needles cast on 3 stitches knit 9 10 11 12 13 14 stitches total of 18 20 22 24 26 28 stitches for middle finger knit 19 21 23 25 27 29 row or to desired length for finger bind off index finger rejoin yarn to reserved 12 14 16 18 19 21 stitches leaving an approximately 6 /15 cm tail to close holes at base of little finger knit 12 14 16 18 19 21 stitches pick up 3 stitches between index and middle fingers total of 15 17 19 21 22 24 stitches for index finger knit 16 18 20 22 24 26 row or to desired length for finger bind off thumb return reserved 13 15 17 19 21 23 stitches for thumb to needles rejoin yarn to reserved stitches leaving an approximately 6 /15 cm tail to close holes at base of thumb knit 13 15 17 19 21 23 stitches pick up 4 stitches between thumb and side of hand total of 17 19 21 23 25 27 stitches for thumb knit 9 11 13 15 17 19 row or to desired length for finger bind off finishing use yarn tails to close small holes at bases of fingers weave in ends questions about this pattern contact us at patricia@dancingtriceratops com and we will be happy to answer them our other knitting patterns including other free patterns are on ravelry at https //www ravelry com/stores/dancing-triceratops-knits cratchit cable braid gloves page 6 of 6 www dancingtriceratops com
